fields.name: Preferential list:
fields.value: ** Choose a player that placed top 3 in the prior evening. They learn any lower placing player that visits them and may choose to refuse any of them. You also learn all their visitors and may refuse any of them. Players you refuse are roleblocked.

fields.name: Eliminate.:
fields.value: (used the same night, with preferential list) You may allow your target to let you attack a visitor of their choise. You will not attack Unseen.

fields.name: Poisoned Drinks (Trigger; 45%):
fields.value: Your target and visitors lose .2x Defense Power tonight, other than Unseen members

fields.name: Escape Plan (Passive):
fields.value: If your target is rampage attacked, you and any other players that win with you will not be attacked

fields.name: Always Prepared (Passive):
fields.value: Immune to roleblocks, and day phase abilities
